Package org.apache.juneau.oapi

Interface OpenApiMetaProvider

All Superinterfaces:
AnnotationProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
OpenApiParser, OpenApiSerializer
public interface OpenApiMetaProvider extends AnnotationProvider
Interface for providing access to OpenApiClassMeta and OpenApiBeanPropertyMeta objects.
See Also:
